Title: Try it Without the Porsche!
Plot: After barely losing the Sandpiper, due to a dirty trick by Tina, Kris and Wildfire attract attention in the media and from a sports agent. Dani has a hard time coming to terms with the truth about her mother and Junior's departure. Meanwhile, Matt and Kris search for Junior.
GuestStars: William Sterchi,  Nicholas Ballas,  Kristy Vaughan,  Scarlett McAlister
